front.title: Web Based System and Network Management

abstract.t: This document describes the application of the Hyper Text Transfer Protocol (HTTP) for system and network management. Presented are mechanisms which facilitate system and network management including the discovery of HTTP management entities and how management content may be accessed. Management and HTTP may be categorized into two groups, the management of HTTP[3] and management using HTTP. The focus of this document is on the latter, 'web based management'.
